actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize modifications to Dickinson Dam, Dickinson Unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes modifications to Dickinson Dam, Dickinson Unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, North Dakota. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to arrange for repayment by the city of Dickinson, North Dakota, for a portion of the work authorized by this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of $4,000,000 for the construction of the works authorized by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize modifications to Dickinson Dam, Dickinson Unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, North Dakota, and for other purposes.
